document.full_text: syrian forces fired live ammunition on friday to disperse protesters in the eastern city of deir al-zor, residents said, as demonstrations erupted across syria in defiance of a military crackdown.
document.title: protests erupt across syria, firing in deir al-zor
lines_and_colors: syrian forces fired live ammunition on friday to disperse protesters in the eastern city of deir al-zor, residents said, as demonstrations erupted across syria in defiance of a military crackdown.
